biotools.summary: Create a new BAM alignment file based on alignments that overlap (or optionally, those that do not overlap) intervals in another BED file. Example usage would be to cull a BAM file from an exome capture experiment to include on the "on-target" alignments.

bioschemas.name: bedtools_intersectbed_bam
bioschemas.summary: Create a new BAM alignment file based on alignments that overlap (or optionally, those that do not overlap) intervals in another BED file. Example usage would be to cull a BAM file from an exome capture experiment to include on the "on-target" alignments.
